thread.title: Rudimental announce 2016 UK tour after clinching their second No.1 album - Music
thread.title_full: Rudimental announce 2016 UK tour after clinching their second No.1 album - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Amy Davidson
title: Rudimental announce 2016 UK tour after clinching their second No.1 album - Music
text: Rudimental are hitting the road in 2016 for a UK tour.After securing their second number one album on Friday with We the Generation, the Hackney group have extended their touring plans into the new year. Tickets for the February-March shows will go on general sale this Friday (October 16).The tour will include their biggest headline show to date when they play London's O2 Arena on March 3. Â© Lovebox / Danny North Rudimental will kick off the UK leg of their world tour tomorrow at Edinburgh's Corn Exchange.Rudimental will play the following 2016 dates:February 26 - Glasgow, O2 AcademyFebruary 27 - Liverpool, Guild of StudentsFebruary 29 - Newcastle, O2 AcademyMarch 1 - Leeds, O2 AcademyMarch 3 - London, O2 ArenaMarch 4 - Nottingham, Rock CityMarch 5 - Plymouth, PavilionsMarch 7 - Birmingham, O2 AcademyMarch8 - Manchester, ApolloWatch the music video for Rudimental's 'Rumour Mill' below:
